fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sacrifice another Coven member at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you sacrifice another Coven member, you will deal an Astral Unstoppable attack to them.

- After you sacrifice a player, they may haunt a player of their choice the following night, dealing an Astral Basic attack to their target.

- With the Necronomicon, you may sacrifice any non-Coven member, dealing a Basic attack to them.

- If a player were to haunt you after you sacrificed them, their ability will fail.

- You cannot sacrifice yourself.

- You cannot sacrifice someone if you had successfully sacrificed someone the night before.
